text: Allah ndivo muchengeti weavo vanotenda. Vanovabuditsa murima vachivapinza muchiedza. Asi kune avo vasingatendi, vachengeti vavo ndivana mwari vemanyepo, vanovabuditsa muchiedza vachivapinza murima (mhando dzakasiyana-siyana dzekusatenda). Avo ndivo vagari vekumoto, umo vachave vanogara nokusingaperi
